articles.title: DPRK, Cuba Ink Agreement on Cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK, Cuba Ink Agreement on Cooperation
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation between the Central Public Prosecutors Office of the DPRK and the Supreme Prosecutor's Office of the Republic of Cuba was signed in Havana on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the Central Public Prosecutors Office headed by Director Kim Myong Gil and DPRK Ambassador to Cuba Pak Chang Yul and from the Cuban side were Dario Delgado Cura, attorney general of the Supreme Prosecutor's Office, and others concerned.
					
					 Kim Myong Gil and Dario Delgado Cura inked the agreement.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nepalese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepalese President
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Bidya Devi Bhandari on her reelection as president of Nepal.
					 In the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue to develop on good terms, the message wished the Nepalese president great success in her precious work for the political stability and independent development of the country.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Nepalese PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Nepalese PM
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Nepalese Prime Minister K. P. Sharma Oli Thursday over the Bangladeshi passenger plane crash in Kathmandu of Nepal that claimed heavy casualties.
					 The message expressed deep condolences to the Nepalese prime minister, government and people and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Bangladeshi PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Bangladeshi PM
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Sheikh Hasina, Bangladeshi prime minister, Thursday in connection with the Bangladeshi passenger plane crash in Nepal.
					 The message expressed deep condolences to the Bangladeshi government and people and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Many People Visit Phophyong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Many People Visit Phophyong Revolutionary Site
Phophyong, March 15 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of visitors is now flowing to the Phophyong Revolutionary Site with the 95th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's 250-mile journey for learning as an occasion.
					 According to data available, more than 8.4 million service personnel, working people and school youth and children from at least 54,000 units have visited the Phophyong Revolutionary Museum for over 50 years since its opening in April Juche 53 (1964).
					
					 At the revolutionary site in Kim Hyong Jik Township of Kim Hyong Jik County, Ryanggang Province, there are the statue of President Kim Il Sung and the monument to "Song of the River Amnok", the Monument to the Phophyong Revolutionary Site, the Phophyong Ferry, etc.
					
					 The Phophyong Ferry is associated with the immortal trace of the President who made the 250-mile journey for learning with patriotism in 1923.
					
					 It tells the history of struggle of the President who embarked upon the road of revolution in 1925, pledging not to return home unless Korea became independent.

articles.title: Seamless Steel Pipe Process under Modernization
articles.content:
Seamless Steel Pipe Process under Modernization
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Chollima Steel Complex in the DPRK has pushed ahead with the modernization of seamless steel pipe process by introducing high-temperature air-combustion technology based on anthracite gasification, as part of the efforts to strengthen the independence and Juche character of metal industry.
					 It is said that the production of seamless steel pipe will be put on a normal basis without using heavy oil and the control system for production process on a technically higher level after modernization.
					
					 A design for remodeling heating furnace was completed in a short span of time together with the dismantlement of waste-heat boiler.
					
					 Now, the complex is pushing ahead with technical preparations and manufacture of equipment like gas pipe.

articles.title: Information System "Nunbit 1.0" Developed
articles.content:
Information System "Nunbit 1.0" Developed
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital in the DPRK has recently developed information system "Nunbit 1.0" which draws attention of experts and doctors.
					 It is an integrated information system which conforms to the international standards in developing the system of electronic clinical chart and supports overall medical services and management of hospital.
					
					 The system corresponds to HL7 (health level 7), SNOMEDCT (systemized nomenclature of medicine clinical terms), LOINC (logical observation identifiers names and codes), ICD-10 (international statistical classification of diseases and related health problems-10th revision) and DICOM (digital imaging and communication in medicine), all of which have been recognized by the International Standards Organization. And it is interchangeable with electronic clinical chart systems of foreign medical institutions.
					
					 According to Hong Un Chol, chief of e-library of the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, the hospital has made fresh achievements in its medical service after introducing the system.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China for significantly celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of President 
					 Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, as the greatest national holiday was formed on March 5.
					
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the general association, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to lay floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin and significantly hold events such as a meeting, photo and book exhibition and art performance to praise his revolutionary career and exploits on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Zhongnan Regional Association, the Liaoning Regional Association and the Yanbian Regional Association and branches under the General Association of Koreans in China decided to organize various celebration events.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Japan's Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Japan's Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are leaving no stone unturned to hide the past sexual slavery with the lapse of time but can never cover up the worst unethical crime through every possible form of tactics, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Thursday.
					 The article says:
					
					 Several data on the sexual slavery by the Japanese imperialists were revealed in less than one year from April last year.
					
					 Those data once again clearly show that the sexual slavery by the Japanese imperialists was the heinous kidnapping and forcible drafting committed by the government and the military in an organized way.
					
					 The Korean nation is grinding their teeth with indignation at the sworn enemy who committed the most hideous unethical crime against the nation and the international community is stunned by the atrocities of the Japanese imperialists without an equal in any war history of the world.
					
					 The hideous crimes against humanity have no statute of limitations.
					
					 Our people will force Japan to pay dearly for all the past crimes against the Korean nation.
					
					 The Abe group can never be pardoned as they are brazen-facedly denying the history of sexual slavery while insisting on the trifling "agreement" they fabricated with the worst pro-Japanese traitor Park Geun Hye group by giving a petty amount of money to it.
					
					 The Abe group would be well advised to ponder over their action, properly understanding the burning wrath of the Korean nation and its will to take retaliatory actions against Japan.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is making desperate efforts to tarnish the international image of the DPRK while resorting to the frantic human rights campaign against it, says a commentary of Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 This is the height of shamelessness and a mockery and an insult to genuine human rights, says the commentary, and goes on:
					
					 It is the height of folly for the U.S., which has seriously threatened the right to existence of the Korean people through persistent sanctions and blockade to violate the sovereignty of the DPRK with nuclear weapons for decades, to voice "concern" about its "human rights performance".
					
					 The world's worst human rights abuser is none other than the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is the matchless tundra of human rights in the world where democracy is crudely violated.
					
					 There are over 200 countries and regions in the world but there is no such a vicious human rights abuser as the U.S. in which all kinds of crimes stalk and police indiscriminately kill defenseless people.
					
					 Barbarous acts committed by the U.S. in other countries shock the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the kingpin of human rights abuses and harasser of peace as it is not hesitating even sanguinary massacre in order to realize its domination ambition.
					
					 The U.S. is behaving foolish to realize its ambition for stifling the DPRK over its "human rights" issue but such an attempt will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, our socialism is a society centered on the popular masses which regards man as dearest.
					
					 Serious human rights issue lies in the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in India
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of HE Kim Il Sung was formed in New Delhi on March 5.
					 Atul Kumar Anjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India who doubles as chairman of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 5 to April 15 and decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the Korean revolution and global independence in this period.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Abuja on March 7.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to introduce the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung, personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man and successes made by the Korean people in safeguarding the country's sovereignty and building a powerful socialist country under his guidance and to hold colorful political and cultural events such as a celebration meeting and film show on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, March 15 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, was formed in Prague on March 6.
					 Jozef Servista, first vice-chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 6 to April 20 and decided to organize various political and cultural functions including a seminar and film show to praise the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the personality of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man in this period.

articles.title: Firmado el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre fiscalias de Corea y Cuba
articles.content:
Firmado el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre fiscalias de Corea y Cuba
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 14 en La Habana el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre la Fiscalia Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Fiscalia Suprema de la Republica de Cuba.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana la delegacion de la Fiscalia Central encabezada por su presidente Kim Myong Gil y el embajador en Cuba Pak Chang Yul, y por la cubana, el presidente de la Fiscalia Suprema Dario Delgado Cura y otras personas interesadas. 
					
					Kim y Dario suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a la reelecta presidenta de Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a la reelecta presidenta de Nepal
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 15 un mensaje a Bidya Devi Bhandari para felicitarle por su reeleccion como presidenta de Nepal.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente, el remitente formulo sinceros votos por los grandes exitos en el noble trabajo de la destinataria por la estabilidad politica y el desarrollo independiente del pais.

articles.title: Serio problema de DDHH hay en EE.UU., comentario de Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Serio problema de DDHH hay en EE.UU., comentario de Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- EE.UU. trata de manchar la imagen exterior de la RPDC con su complot contra esta en el tema de derechos humanos. 
					Asi condena el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 15 y prosigue:
					
					Durante varios decenios, EE.UU. intenta violar con el arma nuclear la soberania nacional de la RPDC amenazando seriamente el derecho a la existencia del pueblo coreano mediante su obstinada campana de sancion y bloqueo
					
					Es muy cinico y absurdo que tal pais se mostrara "preocupado" por la "situacion de DDHH" de alguien.
					
					EE.UU. es el peor violador de DDHH del mundo y la tierra infernal para la democracia.
					
					Aunque existen en nuestro planeta mas de 200 paises y regiones, en ninguna parte se reportan tantos casos de crimenes de todo tipo y asesinatos de indefensos por parte del policia como en EE.UU.
					
					Dejan consternado a todo el mundo sus atrocidades cometidas en otros paises.
					
					Para realizar su ambicion dominacionista, el imperio americano no vacila en ejecutar la operacion genocida ni en perturbar la paz.
					
					No saldra con la suya su intento de atropellar a la RPDC cuestionando el "problema de DDHH".
					
					A decir en claro a EE.UU., el socialismo coreano es la sociedad centrada en las masas populares donde el hombre es considerado como ente mas valioso.
					
					El serio problema de DDHH lo tiene EE.UU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena nuevamente tremendo crimen antietico de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena nuevamente tremendo crimen antietico de Japon
Pyongyang, 15 de marzo (ACNC) -- Aunque los reaccionarios japoneses hacen todo lo posible por dejar en el olvido la esclavitud sexual establecida en el siglo pasado para sus tropas, no podran encubrir jamas este tremendo crimen antietico.
					Adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y prosigue: 
					
					 En menos de un ano desde abril del ano pasado hasta la fecha, se han revelado nuevos datos referentes a la esclavitud sexual.
					
					Ellos evidenciaron una vez mas que ese crimen es el de secuestro y reclutamiento forzado de gran tamano que se llevo a cabo de modo organizado por el gobierno y el circulo militar de Japon.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana vibra de indignacion de ese enemigo jurado y la sociedad internacional esta pasmada ante esa barbarie sin precedentes en la historia mundial de guerras.
					
					Los tremendos crimenes antieticos no tienen prescripcion.
					
					El pueblo coreano cobrara sin falta mil veces mas caro el precio de todos los delitos de Japon contra la nacion coreana.
					
					Es inadmisible que los compinches de Abe negaran descaradamente dicho suceso aduciendo el "acuerdo" que inventaron con la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye a cambio de sumas insignificantes de dinero. 
					
					La banda de Abe debe portarse con prudencia al justipreciar el revanchismo antijapones de la nacion coreana.
